title: About Hack4Change
description: A 3-day intensive collaborative coding event where teams will design, develop, and present working prototypes. This event will focus on addressing a critical challenge faced by civic life.

event.title: Event Details
event.location: Venn Innovation - 770 St George Blvd, Moncton, NB E1E 2C6

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: We are grateful for the support of our partners who make Hack4Change possible.

questions.question: Who can participate in Hack4Change?
questions.answer: Hack4Change is open to anyone interested in civic technology and social innovation. Whether you're a developer, designer, project manager, or someone passionate about community impact, you're welcome to join!

questions.question: Do I need to have a team to participate?
questions.answer: No! You can register as an individual and we'll help you find a team during the event. Alternatively, you can form a team beforehand with friends or colleagues.

questions.question: What should I bring to the hackathon?
questions.answer: Bring your laptop, charger, and any other devices you'll need. We'll provide WiFi, workspace, and meals throughout the event. Don't forget your enthusiasm and creativity!

questions.question: Will there be prizes?
questions.answer: Yes! We'll have prizes for winning teams, as well as special category awards. Details will be announced closer to the event date.

questions.question: What if I've never been to a hackathon before?
questions.answer: That's perfectly fine! Hack4Change welcomes first-time participants. We'll have mentors available throughout the event to help guide you and answer questions.
